ID3Edit
=======

Installation
------------

libprinthex
^^^^^^^^^^^

The library *libprinthex* is used by ID3Edit and must be installed before building ID3Edit.
The installation process is documented in the related chapter: :doc:`/sideprojects/libprinthex`

id3edit
^^^^^^^

Usage
-----


id3show
^^^^^^^

id3frames
^^^^^^^^^

id3dump
^^^^^^^
